title: Shortchanged: Why British Life Expectancy Is Falling
description: For the first time in modern history, Britons are living shorter lives, with poor lifestyles, depression and budget cuts the leading causes.

title: Takis, Sculptor Who Made Art From Moving Parts, Dies at 93
description: His Kinetic works could resemble science projects or unfinished constructions. When they were activated, their movements could startle, educate and entertain.
creator: Fri, 30 Aug 2019 18:27:46 +0000
media_credit: Takis, shown next to one of his works in 1962, was a proponent of Kinetic art — sculptures that used moving parts to explore movement. His materials included motors, magnets and wires.

title: Iranian Journalist Seeks Asylum After Fleeing Foreign Minister’s Press Corps

title: Poland Had the Royal Castle Ready. Then Trump Canceled His Trip.

title: In Siberia, a First Female Mayor Builds a National Profile

title: Overlooked No More: Elizabeth Rona, Pioneering Scientist Amid Dangers of War
description: Rona moved from lab to lab — and country to country — and in the process made important findings about the behavior of atoms and radioactivity.
creator: Thu, 29 Aug 2019 14:15:12 +0000
media_credit: The scientist Elizabeth Rona in about 1925 at the Radium Institute in Vienna. Through her work, the world would learn how radioactivity could be used as a clock in studying the earth’s history, informing the modern practice of geochronology.
